mapper.select: select document_seq, write_date, emer_yn, title, status, name from ( select document_seq, write_date, emer_yn, title, status, docu_code from documents where status = #{status} AND emp_no = #{emp_no} order by write_date DESC ) d join document_list dl ON d.docu_code = dl.docu_code where ROWNUM <= 5
